ya5.1.2:3.1_0: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ,
ya5.1.2:3.1_2: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhañceva dukkhasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:11.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:14.1_0: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:14.1_1: Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:18.1_0: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na samudayasaccaṁ, samudayo.
ya5.1.2:18.1_1: Samudayañca samudayasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva samudayo na ca samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:21.1_0: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodho.
ya5.1.2:21.1_1: Nirodhañca nirodhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva nirodho na ca nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:24.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na maggasaccaṁ, maggo.
ya5.1.2:24.1_1: Maggañca maggasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva maggo na ca maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:27.1_0: Samudayasaccaṁ saccañceva samudayasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:30.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:33.1_0: Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā maggasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:34.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:37.1_0: Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā maggasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:38.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:40.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:41.1_0: Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:42.1_0: Nirodhasaccaṁ saccañceva nirodhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:44.1_0: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ,
ya5.1.2:44.1_2: Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:47.1_0: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ,
ya5.1.2:47.1_2: Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:48.1_0: Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:52.1_0: Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:58.1_0: Na saccā na samudayasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:61.1_0: Dukkhasaccaṁ saccañceva dukkhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:66.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:68.1_0: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā.
ya5.1.2:68.1_1: Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:73.1_0: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā.
ya5.1.2:73.1_1: Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:77.1_0: Samudayasaccaṁ saccañceva samudayasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:80.1_0: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:84.1_0: Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:85.1_0: Nirodhasaccaṁ saccañceva nirodhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:87.1_0: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā.
ya5.1.2:87.1_1: Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:90.1_0: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā.
ya5.1.2:90.1_1: Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:91.1_0: Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:93.1_0: Samudayaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na samudayo, saccā.
ya5.1.2:93.1_1: Samudayañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva samudayo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:98.1_0: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā.
ya5.1.2:98.1_1: Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:101.1_0: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā.
ya5.1.2:101.1_1: Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
